title: Sampler, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cut work with pattern darning or needle-made fillings on plain weave foundation
description: White sampler.  Twelve squares containing pattern darning alternate with squares of cutwork with needle made fillings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cut work with pattern darning or needle-made fillings on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-54.
